about_the_game:
"Northrealm Tribes" is an exciting strategy game that immerses you in the captivating world of the Vikings. In this game, you take on the role of a tribal leader and delve into the rugged and thrilling era of the Norsemen. Your task is to establish, expand, and protect a flourishing settlement while meeting the needs and desires of your inhabitants.

Begin with a modest settlement and transform it into a formidable Viking city. Construct various buildings such as residences, workshops, trading posts, and defensive structures to fulfill the needs of your residents and bolster your power.

Skillfully manage your resources, including wood, stone, food, and more. Utilize the natural resources of your surroundings to sustain your settlement and develop your economy.

Climb the ranks among Viking tribes and overcome increasingly challenging trials as you continually expand your settlement.
